sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>11</base_damage> <critical_rating>3</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>Light repeaters are support weapons for military and mercenary units. They feature a high rate of fire and are designed to suppress and injure unarmored personnel. The hail of "light" produced by these rapid-firing weapons is often enough to force enemies to ground.  Models Include: BlasTech T-21 Light Repeating Blaster.</description> <encumbrance>7</encumbrance> <hard_points>4</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Light Repeating Blaster</name> <number>GEAR0001008</number> <price>2250</price> <range>long</range> <rarity>7</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Ranged - Heavy (Ag)">d8a0d55cdbae88542901de90cf9619c0</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 05:35:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2c15a8e82fd46450e0f497eef699b617</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 05:35:23</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
